entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of drizzle near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or periods of rain. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
